tests.name: send input simple
tests.notes: should always work, no disable paging required, if this is broken things are in bad shape!

tests.name: send input simple, don't strip prompt
tests.notes: should always work, no disable paging required, if this is broken things are in bad shape!

tests.name: disable paging, send inputs
tests.notes: send input test that would require disable paging to have succeeded, base driver does NOT disable paging (or login handler), so we must do that here
